content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1582655658917{padding-top: -5px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”remove-margin”][vc_column_text]

Personal Protective Equipment

Ensure the safety of your patients, employees, and yourself with medical grade Personal Protective Equipment (PPE). We carry masks, gloves, goggles, face shields, infrared thermometers, and advanced thermal scanners to help protect you from threats such as the Coronavirus.

With a wide range of products to choose from we have PPE options that can suit the individual needs of any practice and budget. With FDA approved, medical grade products you can rest assured that you are purchasing genuine equipment when it matters most.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”73899″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1444503683289{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e2e2e2″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=”” el_class=”dotted”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1569437782001{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73982″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/non-contact-thermal-scanner/” css=”.vc_custom_1593020645532{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1593020639275{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Non-Contact Thermal Scanner

Our Non-Contact Thermal Scanner quickly & safely monitors temperature with optional security features.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73945″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/infrared-thermometer/” css=”.vc_custom_1592593425893{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1593094273233{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Infrared Thermometer

Infrared Thermometers reduce risk by measuring the body’s temperature without making physical contact.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73906″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/3-ply-mask/” css=”.vc_custom_1592588372268{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1592588639849{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

3 Ply Mask

Our 3-ply masks are specifically developed for every day use with Bacterial Filtration Efficiency (BFE) > 98%.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73935″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/kn95-mask/” css=”.vc_custom_1592588413211{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1592588438948{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

KN95 Mask

KN95 Masks are widely recommended for healthcare workers who come in direct contact with patients.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73920″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/n95-mask/” css=”.vc_custom_1592588477261{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1592588502585{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

N95 Mask

The N95 mask is the most popular respirator approved by the NIOSH, labeled for their 95% efficiency rating.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”74008″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/vinyl-gloves/” css=”.vc_custom_1593533129986{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1593549923366{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Viynl Gloves

Well suited for the medical and food industries, our lightweight vinyl gloves are hypoallergenic and disposable.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73960″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/face-shield/” css=”.vc_custom_1592851947436{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1592852041493{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Face Shield

Our Medical Face Shield is designed for healthcare workers and allows other PPE to be worn underneath.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73953″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/safety-goggles/” css=”.vc_custom_1592847265153{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1592847378242{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Safety Goggles

Our adjustable, anti-fogging medical safety goggles are suitable for ordinary daily protection.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
